column4: I want to update the nvidia driver, but it won't let me do it with X running.  How do I get out of X?
ctrl+alt+F1 give you a text console, F7 is back to gui. you can run /etc/init.d/gdm stop  to close the gui
I did the gdm stop thing, but I did not get the expected result.  The screen went black, and I have a flashing cursor, but I can't type.
with ctrl+alt+f1 (in text consoles only alt+f1) doesnt gove you a text screen where you can log in?
